title: Where can I find aesthetic video clips to edit together? - Quora

response.answer_text: Aha. I wish someone would’ve just given me a master link to all the best videos to edit. a good place to start looking is Instagram or YouTube. Searching up ‘aesthetic’ on either of those will have a lot of videos. Tags like #lofiedit and #chillvibes have a lot of short aesthetic clips. you can also construct your own. Find aesthetic pictures and make animations or paste gifs onto them. Or find nice videos and add a grain or vhs filter onto them. The app VHS cam on the App Store is a great buy. you really have to scour the internet to find this stuff, but it’s there. It’s definitely a skill and gets easier once you start stockpiling and saving anything you might like.

You cannot use someone else’s content without permission. Doing so is illegal copyright infringement. Instagram expects you to have permission from all of the source video creators, or better, to create the video yourself. And generally, video creators don’t share their videos with others.
